long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture the your workflow to identify repetitive actions and bottlenecks.

Imagine if your browser was able to automatically learn your habits and help you identify the best opportunities for automation within your workflow. With Cohesion, you can.

Cohesion automatically captures data when you go through a workflow and uses that data to identify the most repetitive actions.

All data is stored locally to ensure user privacy.
